title: Drag and drop reordering
description: Reorder tasks within lists by dragging. Update position in database.

title: Quick entry form
description: Proper form when tapping FAB: title, project selector, tags, due date quick picks. Desktop + mobile.
close_reason: Created QuickEntryForm.tsx with bottom sheet on mobile, centered modal on desktop, quick due date buttons

title: Search
description: Global search bar in header. Search tasks, projects, tags. Keyboard shortcut cmd+k.

title: Task detail panel
description: Slide-up modal to view/edit task: title, note, due date, defer date, planned date, flag, estimated duration, project, tags, repeat settings. Desktop + mobile friendly.
close_reason: Created TaskDetailPanel.tsx with slide-up modal on mobile, side panel on desktop, all fields for editing tasks

title: Attachments on notes
description: Attach files/images to task notes. Upload, preview, delete attachments.

title: Clean up / archive completed
description: Hide completed tasks by default. Clean Up button to archive old completed tasks.

title: Tag picker UI
description: Assign/remove tags from tasks in detail panel. Searchable tag list.

title: Project picker UI
description: Assign tasks to projects from detail panel. Searchable project list.

title: Keyboard shortcuts
description: n=new task, e=edit selected, space=complete, f=flag, cmd+k=search, escape=close modals.

title: Action groups / subtasks
description: Nested subtasks UI: indent/outdent, collapse/expand, drag children under parent.

title: Project detail view
description: Edit project: name, notes, type parallel/sequential, review interval, defer/due dates.

title: Review workflow
description: Mark Reviewed button on projects, show next review date, advance to next project in review.

title: Estimated duration UI
description: Duration input field in task detail panel with quick picks (5m, 15m, 30m, 1h, 2h).

title: Custom perspectives builder
description: UI to create/edit custom perspectives with filter rules (status, project, tag, due, flagged).
